existing_features.title: Update the main footer brand block (left column) to include the existing CCS logo image and align it with the footer brand text, matching the header’s branding pattern.

Ensure the footer brand/logo area uses consistent styling with the site’s existing design system (spacing, typography, and hover/focus behavior where applicable) without changing existing footer content or links.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add the requested element/content to the main footer
